name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction(1)
Week 2: Atomic Structure(2)
Week 3: Crystal Structure(3)
Week 4: Solidification(4)
Week 5: Diffusion(5)
Week 6: Mechanical Properties I(6)
Week 7: Mechanical Properties II(7)
Week 8: Phase Diagram(8)
Week 9:　　Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Alloys(9)
Week 11: Polymers(10)
Week 12: Ceramics(11)
Week 13: Composites(12)
Week 14: Corrosion(13)
Week 15: Electrical Properties(14)
Week 16: Optical Properties(15)
Week 17: Magnetic Properties(16), Bio(17, selected)
Week 18: Final Exam
materials:
Textbook: W.F. Smith, J. Hashemi / Anno. SH Wang,”Foundations of Materials Science and Engineering”, McGraw-Hill, 2011.
參考書目References:
1.　　L. H. Van Vlack, “Elements of Materials Science and Engineering,” Addison-Wesley, 6th edition, 1989.
2.　　M. Ashby and D. R. H. Jones, “Engineering Materials 1: An Introduction to Properties, Applications and Design,” Butterworth Heineman, 2nd edition, 1996.
3.　　M. Ashby and D. R. H. Jones, “Engineering Materials 2: An Introduction to Microstructures, Processing and Design,” Butterworth Heineman, 2nd edition, 1998.
4.　　D. R. Askeland and P. P. Phulé, “The Science and Engineering of Materials”, Thomson, 2006.
5.　　W. D. Callister and D. G. Rethwisch, “Materials Science and Engineering”, Wiley, 2011
